amendment.description: Amendment makes technical and clarifying changes and authorizes the English Language Proficiency and Academic Achievement Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 5 printed in the Congressional Record to make technical and clarifying changes and authorize the English Language Proficiency and Academic Achievement Act.

action.text: Goodling amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Goodling amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
